Up | 3–6 months | Inflation undershoots enabling an earlier, fuller Fed easing; accelerated RWA/custodian rollout and crypto balance‑sheet adoption (16T by 2030; 4.2B tokenization; ETH/ETF flows) | Watch CPI prints vs expectations; Fed communications; RWA custodial milestones; ETH/ETF inflows and cross‑border securitization uptake | 65–80%

Down | 3–6 months | Regime B/defensives tilt if inflation persistence strengthens, elevating discount rates and dampening cross‑border securitization; crypto risk‑off as risk premia widen (SRC_REGIME)(SRC_BASE_PRICE)(SRC_WATCH) | Watch wage/inflation data surprises; Jackson Hole dot‑plot shifts; semiconductor capex cadence; BTC/ETH price breaches around 110k–125k (ETH 4k–5k) | 45–60%
